name: Job Search 101 - Gamified ChatGPT Course
description: Transform your job search journey and land your dream job with Job Search 101.Not another generic course or set of prompts.Job Search 101 is a groundbreaking online course that guides you through every step of the job search process. From understanding the job market to crafting standout resumes, mastering interviews, and negotiating job offers, this course empowers you with the tools and knowledge to outshine your competition and secure the job you deserve.Are you tired of sending out countless
features: Lesson 1: Understanding the Job Market (70 prompts); Lesson 2: Job Search Strategies (70 prompts); Lesson 3: Resume and Cover Letter Writing (70 prompts); Lesson 4: Interview Skills(70 prompts); Lesson 5: Negotiating Offers(70 prompts); Lesson 6: Transitioning Into Your New Role (70 prompts); 50+ Job Search Definitions; Job Search Roadmap; 50+ Job Search Tips; Notion AI features
